node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: TREMstop 1A+ is a high-performance, single-component, water-based firestop sealant that will expand to fill the voids left when combustible materials burn and deteriorate in a fire. This versatile firestopping product has exceptional sealant qualities, including superb unprimed adhesion, easy gunning and anti-fungal properties. It can also be painted once fully cured.
node.post_excerpt: single component, water-based, intumescent acrylic firestop sealant
node.category: Firestop | Tremco | TREMstop 1A+ Intumescent Sealant 10oz
node.tags: TremStop 1A+ | caulking|firestop| firestop sealant | sealant |Tremco | Tremco Firestop | intumescent firestop sealant

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: Tremco Vulkem 116 is a one-part, moisture-curing, gun-grade polyurethane sealant with superior primerless adhesion to porous substrates. Tremco Vulkem 116 is an excellent general-purpose sealant designed for use on poured and precast concrete, masonry work, window and door perimeters, and similar types of construction joints. Tremco Vulkem 116 is designed for use on exterior applications but can also be used on interior applications with proper ventilation.

node.post_content: Vulkem 45SSL is a traffic rated, pourable, semi-self-leveling sealant with exceptional primerless adhesion and movement capability. Vulkem 45SSL is suitable for continuous immersion in non-chlorinated water and can be applied to damp and green concrete. The technology in Vulkem 45SSL provides the sealant with greater UV resistance and will not out gas.
node.post_excerpt: one-part, semi self-leveling, moisture-curing, low-modulus, polyurethane sealant.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: Tremco Dymonic FC is a durable, flexible, sealant that offers excellent performance in moving joints and exhibits tenacious adhesion once fully cured. Typical applications for Tremco Dymonic FC include; expansion and control joints, precast concrete panel joints, perimeter caulking (windows, door, panels), EIFS, aluminum, masonry and vinyl siding.

node.post_content: Tremco Dymonic FC is a durable, flexible, sealant that offers excellent performance in moving joints and exhibits tenacious adhesion once fully cured. Typical applications for Tremco Dymonic FC include; expansion and control joints, precast concrete panel joints, perimeter caulking (windows, door, panels), EIFS, aluminum, masonry and vinyl siding.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: Tremco Dymonic 100 is a high performance, medium modulus, low-VOC, UV-Stable, durable, flexible, sealant that offers excellent performance in moving joints and exhibits tenacious adhesion once fully cured. Typical applications for Tremco Dymonic 100 sealant include; expansion and control joints, precast concrete panel joints, perimeter caulking (windows, door, panels), EIFS, aluminum, masonry and vinyl siding. This highly versatile sealant has the unique capability to bond to green or damp concrete.

Typical applications for Tremco Dymonic 100 sealant include; expansion and control joints, precast concrete panel joints, perimeter caulking (windows, door, panels), EIFS, aluminum, masonry and vinyl siding. This highly versatile sealant has the unique capability to bond to green or damp concrete.

node.post_content: Tremco Spectrem 2 is a medium-modulus, high-performing, one-part, neutral cure silicone joint sealant. Tremco Spectrem 2 has excellent physical properties that makes it very suitable for a variety of perimeter caulking and glazing uses. This silicone sealant is Spectremificall y designed for two-sided structural glazing, perimeter and weather sealing. Tremco Spectrem 2 can also be used for cap, heel and toe beads, as well as curtainwall and window joints. Common substrates where Tremco Spectrem 2 can be applied to are steel, aluminum, glass, painted metal, plastic, stone, brick and concrete. Adhesion is obtained without the need of a primer when applied to most construction materials.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: Dymeric 240-FC is a solvent free, low odor, faster curing formulation with easier mixing and handling properties, with more than 77 colors available. Dymeric 240 FC is a non-sag gunnable sealant that offers, flexible, long life, durable, weathertight seals for both new construction and renovation projects. It is a multi-component, chemically-curing, epoxidized polyurethane sealant specially formulated for dynamically moving building joints. Perfect for; precast concrete, masonry, EIPS, roofing, metal curtain wall and perimeter joints, doors, and windows. Grade NS, ASTM C920, Class A, Type II, Color Tint Packs Sold Separatly!
node.post_excerpt: two-part, chemical-curing, Non-Sag, gun-grade polyurethane sealant
node.category: Sealants | Polyurethane Sealants | Tremco | Tremco Dymeric 240FC 1.5-Gallon Pail
node.tags: caulking| masonry| polyurethane sealant | 2-part sealant |Tremco | Dymeric 240 FC | waterproofing | Roofing Sealant |Tilt Wall Sealant | caulk

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: Tremco Butyl Sealant is formulated from a blend of butyl rubber and polyisobutylene to form an economical, flexible, exterior-grade weather-resistant sealant. Can be used for sealing joints in applications such as curtain wall joints, metal panel joining, bedding thresholds, secondary glazing seals, and areas where a seal is required against Tremco Neoprene or EPDM gaskets. Can be used on wood, metal, glass, concrete and masonry.

node.post_content: 3M Polyurethane Sealant 540 is a high performance, fast curing, one component, moisture curing product which forms a permanent elastic bond to a wide variety of materials including plastics, FRP, SMC, aluminum, masonry, steel, coated metal, and wood. This product is ideally suited for a nober of construction applications including; expansion joints, control joints, doors and windows, aluminum curtain walls and storefront glass, as well as precast and tilt-up construction.

node.post_content: 3M 230 Crystal Clear Sealant is compatible with fiberglass, metal, plastic, wood and other materials. It has very good UV resistance, fast 3 minute skin time, and 20 minute tack free time. Versatile adhesion to many different substrates. This sealant is waterproof and for use indoor / outdoor. Minimum to maximum operating temperatures are -35 °F to +350 °F.

node.post_content: 3M 730 Clear Hybrid Sealant is one component, clear polyurethane, Isocyanate-Free, moisture curing sealant which forms permanent elastic bonds to most substrates. Its ideal for sealing, filling, insulating and waterproofing in many industrial environments, including marine, specialty vehicles, glass & window application, and general construction.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: 3M 5200 Marine Adhesive Sealant is a single part sealant that cures to form a firm, rubbery waterproof seal. When fully cured, this high strength marine adhesive remains flexible and suitable for use where shock, vibration, shrinking or swelling are concerns. Use on wood, fiberglass, hardware, motors, seams, and joints. Apply with standard caulking gun. Toolable by trowel or spatula up to four hours, and wont sag or flow in vertical or horizontal seams. Has excellent resistance to weathering and salt water.

node.post_content: 3M CP-25WB+ Fire Barrier sealant helps prevent the spread of fire, smoke and noxious gas. In addition, this product acts as an acoustic barrier by minimizing noise transfer (STC-Rating of 54 when tested in a STC 54-rated wall assembly), helps create a smoke seal for systems requiring the optional L-Rating, meets the intent of LEED® VOC environmental regulations, meets International Building Code (IBC) and other key life safety building code requirements.
node.post_excerpt: one part, High-performance latex-based intumescent firestop sealant. When properly installed, this product provides up to 4-hour fire protection in tested and listed systems. Firestops items penetrating through fire-rated construction assemblies. Dries to red color, no mixing required.

node.post_content: STI SSP Intumescent Firestop Putty Pads are used to seal around electrical boxes to reduce sound transmission (see Technical Update ZSFOD5053) and increase fire resistance. These pads also provide a metered method of application when sealing through-penetrations and in some applications, are used to provide a cushion to allow movement due to settling, expansion and contraction, or vibration.

node.post_content: GE Silpruf 2000 is a high-strength weatherproofing silicone sealant and structural glazing adhesive that provides extended tooling time and withstands significant joint movement. Supplied as a paste, SCS2000 is a one-component, medium-modulus, neutral-cure silicone for use with a wide variety of materials in new and remedial projects. Capable of adhesion to a wide variety of substrates, able to withstand harsh weather conditions, and exhibiting the movement capability required of complex designs, SCS2000 is an exceptional choice for a multitude of both weathersealing and structural glazing applications.

node.post_content: UltraGlaze SSG4000 one part, neutral cure, structural silicone sealant. Features include primerless adhesion to many building substrates. Specific substrate testing is required on all structurally glazed projects. UltraGlaze SSG4000 is compatible with insulating glass sealants, has low odor, a long tooling time, and is non-corrosive. This material can also be used as the weatherseal in glass-to-glass butt joints.

node.post_content: GE Silpruf 2000 is a high-strength weatherproofing silicone sealant and structural glazing adhesive that provides extended tooling time and withstands significant joint movement. Supplied as a paste, SCS2000 is a one-component, medium-modulus, neutral-cure silicone for use with a wide variety of materials in new and remedial projects. Capable of adhesion to a wide variety of substrates, able to withstand harsh weather conditions, and exhibiting the movement capability required of complex designs, SCS2000 is an exceptional choice for a multitude of both weathersealing and structural glazing applications.

node.post_content: Sil-Bond (RTV 4500) High strength, Industrial and construction grade RTV silicone sealant. Sil-Bond RTV 4500 is a one component room temperature vulcanizing RTV acetoxy cure silicone sealant and adhesive that has been chemically formulated for high strength adhesion. When fully cured, this unique VOC compliant formula offers Non-Yellowing, UV stability, and excellent adhesion to form waterproof and airtight bonds to metal, steel, tile, fiberglass, ceramic, glass, aluminum, painted surfaces, wood, plywood, marble, skylights, marine cabins, mold & mildew resistant for kitchen & bath, sealing & glazing, plus many other common substrates. This product is specifically formulated to offer all weather performance to meets today's Green Building Standards. Also meets or exceeds Specifications ASTM C920, Type-S, NS, Class 25; FDA CFR 177.2600, USDA Approved, and is a UL Recognized Component.
node.post_excerpt: one-part, acetoxy RTV silicone, moisture-curing, gun-grade sealant, meets ASTM C920, Type-S, NS, Class 25, USDA Approved.

node.tags: RTV 4500 | silicone sealant | caulking| glass| sealant |Silco | Food Grade Silicone | Sil-Bond 4500 | waterproofing | caulk | adhesives | clear silicone | kitchen bath sealant | ASTM C920

node.post_content: Sil-Flex 7500 Multi-Surface, 1-part, Industrial and construction grade silicone sealant. Sil-Flex (RTV 7500) is a one component, low modulus, neutral cure silicone sealant and adhesive created to bond a wide variety of building materials. When fully cured, this unique VOC compliant formula offers UV stability and tenacious adhesion to pvc, concrete, glass, aluminum, painted surfaces, wood, plywood, stucco, building paper, window wrap, fiber cement, brick, stone, steel, ceramic, porcelain, masonry, plus many other common material surfaces. This product is specifically formulated to offer all weather performance to meet today's Green Building Standards. Meets ASTM C-920, and is Equal to Dow 795, & GE Silpruf 2000 Structural Silicones.

node.post_content: Eco-Flex 9500 is a one component, high modulus, mildew resistant multipurpose silyl-terminated polyether (hybrid) elastomeric sealant and adhesive. When fully cured, this unique VOC compliant formula offers UV stability and firm bonding to PVC, concrete, glass, aluminum, painted surfaces, wood, plywood, marble, metal, plus many other common substrates. This product is specifically formulated to offer all weather performance to meet today's Green Building Standards. Better than most urethanes and silicones, Silco 9500 bonds like urethane, and is UV resistant like a silicone, but is still paintable!

node.post_content: Geocel 2300 Construction Tripolymer Sealant is a single component, high-performance elastomeric sealant for use in a wide variety of roofing, trim, architectural metal, manufacturing, underdeck system, solar roof system, and general construction applications. Will not crack. Asphalt compatible. Exceptional elongation and flexibility. Excellent adhesion to many building surfaces, even when damp. Superior ultraviolet resistance. Resealable, may be applied over itself. Paintable. No dirt pick-up. Easily applied, non-stringing formulation. Available in crystal clear, colors, and specially designed metal roof colors. Tools and cleans up easily. Mildew resistant.

node.post_content: Geocel 2300 Construction Tripolymer Sealant is a single component, high-performance elastomeric sealant for use in a wide variety of roofing, trim, architectural metal, manufacturing, underdeck system, solar roof system, and general construction applications. Will not crack. Asphalt compatible. Exceptional elongation and flexibility. Excellent adhesion to many building surfaces, even when damp. Superior ultraviolet resistance. Resealable, may be applied over itself. Paintable. No dirt pick-up. Easily applied, non-stringing formulation. Available in crystal clear, colors, and specially designed metal roof colors. Tools and cleans up easily. Mildew resistant.

node.post_content: Geocel GeoGreen 4300 Clear Sealant is high performance, solvent free, chemically curing Scypolymer sealant with excellent adhesion to many substrates including wood, stone, concrete, metal glass, tile, brick, and asphalt shingles. Interior/exterior applications, will not shrink, mold/mildew resistant when cured, fast curing, permanantly flexible, UV resistant when cured. Applies in wet or dry conditions. Paintable with latex-based paints. Meets ASTM C-920. All weather plastic cartridge

node.post_content: GeoGreen 4350 Construction Sealant is a high performance, chemically curing Scypolymer sealant that offers excellent adhesion to many substrates including wood, stone, concrete, metal, glass, tile, brick, and asphalt shingles. GeoGreen 4350 Construction Sealant can be used as an interior/exterior sealant, can withstand all weather conditions, is UV resistant, and is tolerant to damp surfaces. GeoGreen 4350 Construction Sealant will not shrink and is solvent free.

node.post_content: Geocel 4500 is a High performance Scypolymer adhesive sealant. 4500 adheres without the need for primers or cleaners to EPDM, BUR, metal, asphalt, concrete, wood, and other building materials. Geocel 4500 EPDM is a premium one component, solvent free, Scypolymer, adhesive, sealant. Can be applied underwater, and cures underwater. Geocel 4300 may be used on TPO and PVC applications along with Geocel 45P Primer. Geocel 4500 can be used as a lap adhesive and a scrim edge sealant. Works with EPDM membranes, tapes, and patches. All-weather plastic 10 fl. oz. cartridge.

node.post_content: Geocel RP-400 Construction Plastic Wet-Dry Surface Roof Cement is a single-component, asbestos free, asphalt-based cement designed for many construction, roofing, manufacturing, and industrial applications. Use on wet or dry roof surfaces, even underwater. Formulated to seal quickly; will not pull apart or lose its bond. Remains soft and pliable, and resists temperature change. Adheres to: Asphalt, modified bitumen, and other common building substrates.

node.post_content: Geocel 2310 Brushable Tripolymer Sealant is a single-component, brushable elastic sealant with rubber-like flexibility, designed for many construction, roofing, manufacturing, and industrial applications. It adheres to many common construction materials including such as; Brick, Concrete, Wood, Metal, Asphalt, and damp, oily, or dirty surfaces. Withstands water contact immediately after application to stop leaks. Prevents rust on metal surfaces. Mildew resistant. Paintable. Crystal clear. Resealable. All weather application. Stays flexible.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: M-1 is a Solvent Free, single component, moisture curing, polyether, gun grade adhesive designed for product assembly applications that require high strength, and a self fixturing viscosity. M-1 is thermosetting and adheres tenaciously to metal surfaces and most engineering plastics. The unique, fast setting alkoxy cure allows this adhesive to develop strength rapidly after only brief exposure to moisture. M-1 is elastomeric and exhibits excellent low temperature properties. M-1 contains zero solvents and can be used safely in confined work spaces. Paintable within 24 hours.
node.post_excerpt: one-part, solvent free, moisture-curing, gun-grade Polyether sealant

node.post_content: M-1 is a Solvent Free, single component, moisture curing, polyether, gun grade adhesive designed for product assembly applications that require high strength, and a self fixturing viscosity. M-1 is thermosetting and adheres tenaciously to metal surfaces and most engineering plastics. The unique, fast setting alkoxy cure allows this adhesive to develop strength rapidly after only brief exposure to moisture. M-1 is elastomeric and exhibits excellent low temperature properties. M-1 contains zero solvents and can be used safely in confined work spaces. Paintable within 24 hours.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: DuraLink Super Adhesion Sealant is an extremely elastic moisture curing sealant designed for use in metal architecture, curtain wall construction and joints subject to movement. Chemlink DuraLink's adhesion to difficult surfaces permits its use on anodized metal and coatings such as Kynar PVDF. Chemlink DuraLink will not stain absorbent stone substrates like limestone or marble. Chemlink DuraLink is a unique polyether sealant that eliminates out-gassing (bubbling) on green concrete, and protects against "sun tanning" or discoloration when exposed to ultraviolet light. Solvent Free, 100% Solids will not shrink. Fast 30 minute skin time, color stable, paintable in 24 hours, no bubbling, 50% joint movement.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: Clear is a moisture curing, polyether sealant designed for application in damp, dry, or cold climates. Better than a silcone or a urethane ! Clear is solvent free and contains no isocyanates. Clear will not shrink upon curing, will not discolor when exposed to UV light, and does not "out gas" or bubble on damp surfaces as urethane sealants often do. Clear has resilient "elastomeric" properties and excellent adhesion to most construction materials such as; wood, metal, glass, EIFS, EPS foam, brick, concrete and stone. It works well in joints that expand or contract more than 25%. Unlike most silicones, CLEAR is rain-ready within 20 minutes, compared to 1-3 hours, and is paintable within 24 hours. Clear can be used effectively in many difficult construction site conditions, curing in wet or dry climate conditions and at low temperatures 32°F (0°C).

node.post_content: 1-Part Pourable Sealer is a fast skinning, moisture-cure, self-leveling, high performance, waterproofing sealant for pipes, penetration seals, and odd shapes in exterior or interior environments with horizontal application. It is suitable for application in damp, dry, or cold climates. 1 Part is solvent free, contains no isocyanates and will not shrink upon curing. 1 Part does not "out-gas" or bubble on damp surfaces as urethane sealants often do. 1 Part has resilient "elastomeric" properties and excellent adhesion to most construction materials. 1 Part can be used effectively in many difficult construction site conditions and cures in wet or dry climate conditions and at low temperatures (32°F / 0°C). 1 Part's low durometer accommodates greater movement in penetration seals than typical urethane sealants.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: NovaLink SL is a self-leveling, moisture curing, polyether sealant, designed for application on horizontal joints in concrete construction such as driveways, sidewalks, plaza decks, balconies, stairwells, parking structures, roof decks, and surrounding fountains and swimming pools. NovaLink SL cures rapidly to a solid rubber seal that can accommodate 25% joint movement. Its unique polyether cure chemistry allows NovaLink SL to be installed on damp concrete or in damp weather conditions without outgassing or forming CO2 bubbles, as urethane sealants often do. Its excellent self leveling properties and smooth finish allow NovaLink SL to be installed without tooling. The elimination of masking tape and tooling results in a significant reduction in labor. Novalink SL is solvent free and will not shrink. Its excellent adhesion to clean masonry or concrete allows it to be installed without a primer in most joints smaller than 1/2 inch

Solvent free, 100% solids will not shrink, 50 minute skin over, no outgassing on damp surfaces, and bonds to asphalt and concrete.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: BARR Squeegee Grade Liquid Membrane is a cold applied, single component, polyether based waterproofing membrane that cures by exposure to atmospheric and substrate moisture to form a continuous, tough, reinforced elastic seal. BARR is solvent free and compliant with all known environmental and OSHA requirements. It can be used in confined spaces without respiratory protection. BARR cures to an elastomeric rubber that is resistant to thermal shock. It will not crack in extreme cold or slump due to softening and high temperatures like conventional asphalt or coal tar based coatings often will. In above grade applications, use BARR to seal parapets, plaza decks, green roof systems and waterproof planter boxes. BARR is also a versatile general roofing repair product that can even be used to line and waterproof gutters. In below grade applications, BARR is ideal as a positive-side waterproofing for sealing foundations. It can also be used for between slab waterproofing, equipment wells, and other underground construction. Barr will adhere to asphalt based surfaces, granulated shingles, wood, metal, masonry, EPDM roofing, glass, polyurethanes.

node.post_content: E-Curb penetration seals replace old-style metal pitch pans with versatile, precast components and pourable sealants.CHEM LINK's E-Curb System can usually be installed in under 15 minutes and never requires flashing or mechanical attachment. E-Curbs are designed for use on granulated modified bitumen, asphalt and coal tar B.U.R. (built up roofing). E-Curbs are specified for PVC, PIB, and TPO single ply roofing membranes. E-Curbs are highly versatile for sealing penetrations around solar panel mounts, HVAC, Electrical, and any type of structural supports. TPO Primer is required for use with TPO. When installed properly, this system forms a durable, waterproof rubber seal around penetrations. An extended warranty against leaks is activated with submittal of a completed warranty card.

node.post_content: Build Secure High-Strength Construction & Subfloor Adhesive from ChemLink is a "green" structural sealant that is fast setting, and fast curing adhesive designed for commercial and residential panel on frame assemblies. BuildSecure is 100% VOC compliant, non-flammable and non-carcinogenic. Build Secure adhesive is a high adhesion product which meets specifications for sub floor construction (AFG-01, UM-60, ASTM D-3498) BuildSecure achieves "wood tearing bonds" in as little as four hours. With 500+ PSI shear strength, build secure is ideal for floor decks, shear walls and roof assemblies. BuildSecure is 100% solids. This means build secure can be used on irregular surfaces without fear of shrinking.

node.post_content: TileSecure Roof Tile Adhesive is a high-performance, moisture-curing polyether adhesive, formulated for installation and repair of clay, composite, concrete, and slate roof tiles. TileSecure is a one component, ready to use adhesive formulated to install and repair a variety of natural and synthetic roof tiles. TileSecure is UV resistant, 100% solids, contains very low VOC's and no California Proposition 65 listed materials. The non-sag, quick setting formulation is especially designed for roof tiles, valley and edge tiles, wall tiles and the repair of broken tiles. TileSecure may be painted and will provide a long lasting adhesive seal.

node.post_content: WallSecure is a fast setting wall and block adhesive with excellent adhesion to drywall, wood, metal, concrete, landscape blocks, capstones, and other masonry substrates. Excellent, fast-setting adhesive for walls and masonry blocks. WallSecure is 100% solids and is ideal for filling gaps or forming bonds on irregular surfaces without shrinking. WallSecure is a solvent free, non-flammable, moisture curing adhesive that complies with all OSHA, State, Local and Federal air quality regulations. This adhesive is non-carcinogenic and contains no substances listed on California Proposition 65.

node.post_content: Ultrabond-1 is a two part, 100% solids, high modulus, fast-curing, anchoring adhesive, and structural epoxy gel. It is a solvent free, no odor, high strength, moisture insensitive, non-sag epoxy system. Ultrabond-1 Epoxy anchoring gel is formulated for anchoring threaded rod, rebar, bolts, and dowels into concrete, grout filled block, and masonry. Ultrabond-1 can be used as a pick proof sealant for windows, doors, locks in correctional facilities, capping paste, and seismic anchoring and bracing. Can be applied, and cures underwater! Fast 20 minute working time! ICC approved

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: Crackbond CSR is a specially formulated, very low viscosity, 2-component hybrid polyurethane. It is a rapid curing concrete repair material perfect when minimal down time is required. Its low viscosity offers deep penetration into hairline cracks of the concrete for a structural repair. The addition of aggregate makes a quality spall repair product that is ready for grinding and open to traffic in less than 1 hour. Difficult repairs are now simple, just clean the area, prime with Crackbond CSR, add silica sand, and flood with additional Crackbond CSR. In 60 minutes or less youll get a tough 4900 psi polymer concrete that will stay in place permanently. It is a solvent free system and can be used in temperatures between 0°F to 115°F which makes it perfect for repairs in freezers! At only 60 centipoise Crackbond CSR actually injects itself into the matrix of the concrete and shores up the existing concrete as well as making the repair.

node.post_content: Crackbond LR321 Injection Resin is a two component, 2:1 ratio, 100% solids,high modulus, structural epoxy adhesive. It is a solvent free, low odor, high strength, moisture insensitive, low viscosity epoxy system. Crackbond LR321 can be used at temperatures between 40°F - 110°F., providing contractors with a choice for injecting cracks in high and low temperature environments. In addition, Crackbond LR321 has a viscosity of 450 cps which is ideal for gravity feed crack injection applications. Crackbond LR321 is an excellent choice where a high strength adhesive with maximum field reliability is desired.

node.post_content: Crackbond SLV-302 is formulated for use as an injection resin for cracks in concrete/wood structures and as a penetrating healer/sealer/primer. It has the viscosity of a very light oil, and low surface tension, allowing it to deeply penetrate fine/hairline cracks. It cures to a solid with no shrinkage, bonds to both surfaces of the crack, bonding the structure back to its original monolithic strength.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: Abatron's Wood Restoration system has been specified by the US Government, national restoration centers, museums, architects and other professionals, LiquidWood® and WoodEpox® represent the greatest advance ever in wood restoration history. They give new life to rotted, severely damaged windows, columns, frames, structural and decorative wood components. LiquidWood® consolidant reinforces, rebuilds and waterproofs wood by hardening after penetrating. When dry, it can be painted or glued. After the LiquidWood® has been applied, the surface is ready for WoodEpox®. WoodEpox®, a versatile, high strength, noshrink structural putty that is used to fill cracks, holes or voids of any size or can be used to replace missing parts of window sills, structural components, etc. After an item has been treated with this 2 part restoration system, it can be sawed, nailed, planed and machined just like wood.

node.post_content: Abocrete epoxy concrete patching and resurfacing compound permanently bonds concrete, patching spalls, filling cracks, resurfacing, anchoring posts, rebar, and machinery. node.post_content: Abocoat 8508-1 is a heavy duty, 80% Solids, protective epoxy coating for concrete, metal, wood, and composite surfaces including floors, walls, furniture, machinery and most rigid surfaces in industrial, construction, marine, and general work environments. Excellent primer or color base for polyurethane and other coatings. Corrosion inhibitor, even on rusty surfaces. Excellent for wear-resistance in heavy-traffic areas. Requires no primer. Protects against water, salt, weathering, fuels, and chemicals. Can be applied to damp surfaces with excellent adhesion and film integrity. Available in standard and custom colors. Est. Coverage per gal = 340 sqft @ 3 mil
node.post_excerpt: Industrial Floor Epoxy, 2-component (1:1 ratio), Solvent-based, High Gloss, Heavy Duty Epoxy Coating.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: Abatron Flexible vinyl chips premixed colors ready for application and designed for use with Abatron epoxy and urethane coatings to enhance the look of your concrete floor, patio, garage, basement, porch, pool deck, walkway, and more. When broadcasting onto a freshly coated surface, these decorative chips bond to the wet film to become a permanent part of the coating. This product is durable for interior & exterior use and also can be used with other compatible water or solvent-based concrete coatings to hide dirt and surface imperfections while giving a decorative appearance. Coverage = 60 sq. ft. per pound (HEAVY COVERAGE), or 125 sq. ft per pound (MEDIUM COVERAGE), or 250 sq. ft. per pound (LIGHT COVERAGE) Manufactures photo (shown) is 8 sq. ft. Vinyl Chips per pound

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: Sof Backer Rod (SBR) Not all backer rod is created equal! Sof Rod is a state-of-the-art sealant backing material combining the best properties of both open and closed cell backer rods in a single, trouble-free product. Sof® Rod is a continuous length of extruded polyolefin foam made with a non-absorbent outer "skin" and a highly resilient interior network of open and closed cells. Sof® Rod will not out-gas if ruptured. Sof Rod has No Moisture Absorption unlike other backer rods, and Easily Conforms to Irregular sized Joints and gaps. Compatible with all know types of sealants including butyl, polyurethane, silicones, polyether, scypolymer, tri-polymer, polysulfide, acrylic, etc. Consists of both open and closed cells on the inside with a skin-like outer texture. Non-stick Bi-Cellular skin open and closed cell. High moisture resistance. SOF-Rod may also be used as a gasket or sealing material as per ASTM C 717.
node.post_excerpt: Cylindrical, flexible sealant backer rod composed of bi-cellular material TYPE: B - Per ASTM C 1330. Round rods of various diameters for use with non-sag and self leveling cold applied sealants TYPE: 3 - Per ASTM D 5249. Also reference ASTM C 717 for use as gasket or sealing material.
node.category: Backer Rod | Nomaco | Soft Backer Rod
node.tags: Sof Rod | caulking| masonry| polyurethane sealant | sealant |Nomaco | Foam Rod | Construction Materials| construction foam| Backer Rod | Poly Foam | waterproofing | caulk | Log Home Chinking | denver foam | mile high foam| Window and Door Backing Rod | Glazing Rod | Filler Rope | open cell rod | closed cell rod | Soft Backing Rod | Joint Filler

node.post_content: Sof Backer Rod (SBR) Not all backer rod is created equal! Sof Rod is a state-of-the-art sealant backing material combining the best properties of both open and closed cell backer rods in a single, trouble-free product. Sof® Rod is a continuous length of extruded polyolefin foam made with a non-absorbent outer "skin" and a highly resilient interior network of open and closed cells. Sof® Rod will not out-gas if ruptured. Sof Rod has No Moisture Absorption unlike other backer rods, and Easily Conforms to Irregular sized Joints and gaps. Compatible with all know types of sealants including butyl, polyurethane, silicones, polyether, scypolymer, tri-polymer, polysulfide, acrylic, etc. Consists of both open and closed cells on the inside with a skin-like outer texture. Non-stick Bi-Cellular skin open and closed cell. High moisture resistance. SOF-Rod may also be used as a gasket or sealing material as per ASTM C 717.
node.post_excerpt: Cylindrical, flexible sealant backer rod composed of bi-cellular material TYPE: B - Per ASTM C 1330. node.post_content: Hard Backer Rod (HBR) Not all backer rod is created equal! Nomaco HBR limits the depth of the sealant and prevents excessive sealant use. It also helps sealant assume optimum shape factor to prolong sealant service life and acts as a barrier to the flow of sealant through the joint. Common applications include, but are not limited to, expansion and contraction joints, curtain walls, construction partitions, parking decks and bridge construction.
node.post_excerpt: Cylindrical, flexible, continuous lengths of extruded, closed-cell polyethylene foam backer rod for use as a backing material for elastomeric and other cold applied sealants TYPE: C - Per ASTM C 1330. Round rods of various diameters for use with cold applied joint sealants TYPE: 3 -Per ASTM D 5249.

node.post_content: Hard Backer Rod (HBR) Not all backer rod is created equal! Nomaco HBR limits the depth of the sealant and prevents excessive sealant use. It also helps sealant assume optimum shape factor to prolong sealant service life and acts as a barrier to the flow of sealant through the joint. Common applications include, but are not limited to, expansion and contraction joints, curtain walls, construction partitions, parking decks and bridge construction.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: COX 41004 Chilton 10 ounce Industrial caulk gun features a rotating barrel, and dripless caulk switch. Cox brand is designed to outlast those caulk dispensers that are found at the hardware and big box home improvement stores. This caulk gun's body is constructed of a heavy duty die-cast zinc alloy to withstand years of use. The caulk flow is 12:1 which is adjustable depending on your preference. This caulking tool comes with a wear compensating device, a built in ladder hook for both convenience and safety and also a sintered steel catch plate. Although the COX model 41004 caulk gun is economical in price, it is definitely well constructed and has received many positive reviews for its stamina and workability. It works quite well with low - medium viscosity silicone sealants, polyurethane sealants and adhesives. MADE IN THE USA !!
node.post_excerpt: 12 to 1 thrust ratio, perfect for pumping most urethanes and silicone sealants
node.category: Applicator Guns | Cartridge Guns | Cox 10-oz Gun #41004
node.tags: 41004 | caulking| polyurethane sealant | sealant |Cox | Cox 41004 Chilton | Cox Caulking Gun | 41004 Caulking Gun | caulk | Cox North America

node.post_content: COX 41006 Tuck Pointing Gun is designed for mortar and tile applications. Scoop or pour material into tube for dispensing. Package includes standard nozzle, grout nozzle, tube, and turbine mixer (for mixing anything from paint to concrete). 1 quart (32-oz) capacity tube. The mechanical advantage 12:1 so it will save your arms. Body made from die cast zinc alloy. Thumb actuated instant pressure release to easily and quikcly stop the flow of material out of the nozzle. T-rod for easy loading TIP: To prevent your mortar mixture from sticking to the inside of the caulking gun, pre-lubricate the inside of the tube and grout nozzle with WD-40. We also stock replacement tubes, and Cone Nozzles!

node.post_content: HYBRI-SIL is an adhesive caulk that features a 3 in 1 sealant system combining the paintability of acrylic, waterproof nature of silicone and the adhesion strength of polyurethane all in one. node.post_content: Tremco 440 Butyl Architectural Tape is a pre-formed butyl sealant in tape form. The 100 percent solids compound of butyl and polyisobutylene contains no solvents or other volatiles that could escape on exposure, causing shrinkage and sealant failure. Tremco 440 forms a watertight seal to prevent water infiltration, and has superior weather resistance. Highly adhesive, it remains permanently elastic, even at low temperatures, and is adaptable to many different types of glazing systems. Use Tremco® 440 for non-compression glazing of vision lites and spandrel panels in metal and wood frames in low rise building construction. It can also be used for lap sealing between panels such as steel, aluminum and porcelain, as well as a variety of other joints in shear between similar and dissimilar materials.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: Smart Roof 1-Coat (Solvent-free) Silicone Roof Coating is a one-component, moisture-curing silicone rubber roof coating system designed for use on existing smooth BUR, granulated cap sheet, well-adhered acrylic coating, concrete, metal, sprayed-in-place polyurethane foam and various aged membrane roofing. The coating is spray or rolled applied and touch-up work can be done with a brush or roller. The system provides long-term protection because it resists weathering, aging, oxidation, wind-driven sand, rain and snow, the effects of ozone, ultraviolet radiation and the temperature extremes typically found on roofs. With its high solids content and absence of hydrocarbon solvents, Smart Roof 1-Coat (Solvent-free) Silicone Roof Coating can be applied in excess of 40 mils in a single coat without blistering, while maintaining maximum adhesion. This product may contribute toward a variety of LEED credit points. Bonds to Torchdown, Metal, Modified Bitumen, Smooth Built Up, Coated Roof, Granulated Cap Sheet, PVC, TPO, EPDM, Concrete, SPF roofs.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: Shingle Sealer 100% Acrylic Clear Roof Sealer is a premium quality acrylic emulsion clear sealer/finish that penetrates and bonds to a variety of roofing substrates, including asphalt shingles. It provides an attractive satin-gloss that resists dirt, cracking, chipping, mildew, algae, alkali, is non-yellowing, low VOC, and provides excellent product versatility and is easy to apply. 100% Acrylic FormulaExcellent Durability & AdhesionMildew & Algae ResistantAlkali ResistantResists Cracking & ChippingLow VOCNon-YellowingExcellent Product VersatilitySoap & Water Clean-Up. Easy To Apply. Water will "sheet-off" the surface because Roof Shingle Sealer seals the surface with a long-lasting finish that reduces water intrusion by sealing fine cracks, crevices or pores. Coverage ranges from 250 to 350-sq. ft./gal depending on the roofs absorbency. Shingle Sealer is the consistency of water and can be brushed or rolled on, but spraying and back rolling is recommended. Two coats are required for the 5-year limited material warranty. More coats can be applied for an even shinier appearance. Shingle Sealer can be reapplied every three to five years for continued maintenance. While manufactured mostly for asphalt roofing, the sealer works on most sloped roofs including concrete, wood, adobe and various types of metal roofing. All need to be properly washed and prepared according to instructions, and the temperature must be 45 degrees F or higher.

node.post_content: EZ Flo is a closed cell self curing Polyurethane foam which expands, bonds and seals. Stopping the passage of air, gases, water and dust. This helps to increase energy efficiency by stopping air exchange around windows, doors, wall intrusions and at sill plates. Its lightweight, closed cell structure makes it useful for deadening sound, flotation and thermal insulation. EZ Flo can expand to fill holes around pipes and ducts to reduce noise, seal out insects, and fill rodent holes. It is also useful for sealing work areas prior to asbestos stripping to prevent the transport of fibers.

node.post_content: PUR Stick adhesive is the professional Polyurethane foaming adhesive system that adheres and bonds materials into place, its creamy thick composition make it perfect for sealing and stopping the passage of air, gases, water, dust, fibers and sound. It's an economical alternative to standard adhesive caulk, saving you both time and money. The gun dispenser is perfect for construction professionals, giving them the benefits of complete control, no messy clean-ups and unlimited start ups.
node.post_excerpt: PUR Stick has passed the ASTM C-557 and the American Plywood Association's AFG-01. This adhesive is equivalent to 60 standard 10-oz tubes of construction caulking adhesive. Pur Stick also eliminates squeaks on subfloor gluing applications. Pur Stick is a real tool that reduces labor time.ater and dust. This helps to increase energy efficiency by stopping air exchange around windows, doors, wall intrusions and at sill plates.

node.post_content: IPF Polyurethane Foam fills cracks, slits and holes with long-lasting seals. Closed-cell foam stops the passage of most insects and small animals. It also stops water, gas, smoke, radon and dirt, and will not shrink or harden with age. Dispensed through the foam gun, this system assures professional placement of the exact amount of foam required to seal any gap. Natural scented spices are added to this polyurethane foam sealant. These added spices release an aroma that is an added deterrent for sealing out insects, rodents, birds and small animals. Delivers 2,200 cu. in. of foam that can produce a 1/2" diameter bead of sealant over 960 linear feet. Must be applied with a foam applicator gun (sold separately)

node.post_content: Weather Worker 40% is a one-part silane molecule that can penetrate deeper into the substrate than conventional sealers and even deeper than a typical siloxane sealer. Once the silane molecule penetrates the surface it chemically reacts with, and bonds to, the concrete or masonry substrate. As a result of the strong chemical bond, silane waterproof protection will last many times longer than conventional coatings. Ideal for; Cast-In-Place Concrete, Precast Concrete, Exposed Aggregate, Mortar, and Stucco.
node.post_excerpt: a single component 40% silane that penetrates into concrete or masonry and provides long term weatherproofing protection.

node.post_content: ChemSeal Foundation Coating is a Portland cement based, waterproof coating for exterior, interior, below grade, or above grade concrete and masonry, and suitable for negative and positive side waterproofing applications. ChemSeal, Foundation Coating, is an easy to apply brush-on, portland-cement-based waterproof coating for exterior below-grade concrete and masonry. It can also be used as a waterproof base coat on above-grade walls before they are overcoated with Stucco. Must be mixed with Cretelox to achieve properties listed in Data Sheet. Apply with stiff broom or masonry stucco brush.

node.post_content: ChemMasters Traz 25 is a high solids, high performance concrete curing & sealing compound for decorative concrete such as stamped and exposed aggregate. Traz 25 is formulated with methyl methacrylate polymers that develop high gloss and are more chemically resistant than standard acrylic sealers. Traz 25s film will not yellow under any UV conditions and is extremely durable.
node.post_excerpt: a Non-Yellowing, Methyl-Methacrylate Sealer for decorative concrete, pavers, exposed aggregate, stamped concrete and terrazzo stone. Superior resistance to UV light, freeze thaw, acid rain, staining and water absorption with moderate chemical resistance.

node.post_content: Safe Cure & Seal 309 is a water emulsion, styrene acrylate copolymer curing and sealing compound with U.V. absorbers and stabilizers for maximum yellowing resistance. Features a low-odor and produces a medium gloss film. Safe Cure and Seal 309 is used for curing fresh concrete to ASTM C309 standards and protects concrete surfaces from the intrusion of water borne contaminants and dirt.

node.post_content: Slip Stop is a micronized polymer that can be added to acrylic sealers, epoxies, urethanes and other floor coatings to provide slip resistance, fine texturing and gloss reduction. Stirs in easily; does not change viscosity of the coating or sealer. Stays in suspension, even in thin material.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: Polyseal EZ is a specialized concrete curing and sealing compound formulated to have unique bubble resistant qualities in hot temperature applications. This state of the art proprietary formulation resists bubble formation, stringing and cob webbing, with a lower viscosity to promote increased penetration, absorption and adhesion within concrete substrates. Polyseal EZ is non-yellowing and creates a glossy color enhancing finish that remains clear throughout its service life. Protects concrete surfaces against chemicals, fertilizers, salts, grease, oil, alkalis, mild acids and detergents.
node.post_excerpt: Low VOC, Bubble Resistant, Slow Evaporating polymer Cure & Seal, meets ASTM-309 Concrete sealing

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: PWS-5 Water Sealant is ideal for use on concrete, brick, block, precast, pavers, manufactured stone, natural stone, ArcusStone, stucco, marble, slate, treated wood and other porous building materials. This clear, penetrating, RTV Silicone sealer is a proprietary blend of inorganic silicone polymers which provide maximum resistance to breakdown from the suns damaging UV light, as well as resistance to acid rain. PWS-8 Watersealants unique silicone technology allows it to remain flexible inside the substrate to allow for bridging of hairline cracks and protect against building freeze-thaw cycles. Once installed it remains breathable to allow moisture vapor to escape while preventing outside water penetration. Simple 1-coat application, 10-Year warranties available. Meets ASTM E 514 Water Repellency & Wind Driven Rain Conditions

This clear, penetrating, RTV Silicone sealer is a proprietary blend of inorganic silicone polymers which provide maximum resistance to breakdown from the suns damaging UV light, as well as resistance to acid rain. node.post_content: PWS-15 Water Sealant (recommended for Extremly Porous Vertical Substrates only) is ideal for use on concrete, brick, block, fluted block, split face block, Haydite, and other very porous building materials. This clear, penetrating, RTV Silicone sealer is a proprietary blend of inorganic silicone polymers which provide maximum resistance to breakdown from the suns damaging UV light, as well as resistance to acid rain. PWS-15 Watersealants unique silicone technology allows it to remain flexible inside the substrate to allow for bridging of hairline cracks and protect against building freeze-thaw cycles. Once installed it remains breathable to allow moisture vapor to escape while preventing outside water penetration. Simple 1-coat application, 10-Year warranties available. 2-coats required when using PWS-15 as an Anti-Graffiti system. Meets ASTM E 514 Water Repellency & Wind Driven Rain Conditions

node.post_content: Lambert's concrete colors are integral cement colors used for coloring concrete, mortar and stucco, contains synthetic iron oxides with some natural and chromium oxides milled from pure pigments, and no additives. Some key factors to uniform color application is to maintain consistency in the types and volumes of each ingredient, water content, water-cement ratio, and number of finishers and their finishing skills and techniques. Colored concrete is one of the most visible sales tools in building and concrete construction.

node.post_content: Renew Coat is a high quality, pre-packaged, thin cementious repair and resurfacing material requiring only water to mix. Designed for interior and exterior use, the special additives give a fast set: open to foot traffic in 2 to 3 hours and vehicle traffic in 24 to 36 hours. Creates a like new appearance.

node.post_content: UV SUPER SEAL is a solvent-based uv-stable concrete curing and sealing compound formulated using styrene-acrylate resin formulated to meet ASTM C-1315 Class A. UV SUPER SEAL is used for curing and sealing of all types of cementitious based substrates. The high quality film-forming properties of UV SUPER SEAL make it an ideal product for interior or exterior use on all types of flooring, walls, pavements, and parking decks.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: EXPOSITE SB is a high performance acrylic sealer which leaves a glossy protective membrane on the concrete surface. It waterproofs, seals, and brings out the color to the substrate it is applied to. The higher solids content increases the integral strength of the film; spalling is minimized and abrasion resistance to traffic, or windblown sand, is strengthened. Contains no silicones, waxes, or oils, and does not chip or peel when applied properly to clean dry concrete substrates. EXPOSITE SB penetrates deep into the concrete pores providing unusual durability and protection. Treated surfaces shed water, dirt, soot and chemical contaminants to prevent staining and moisture damage to the matrix. It will also enhance the color of integral colored concrete or exposed aggregate concrete by giving it a "wet glossy look". Because of the unusual characteristics of this formulation, it may be used for many different applications. Coverage = approx 200 to 400 sq. ft. per gallon

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: Weld-Crete bonds new concrete, stucco, tile setting beds and terrazzo to any structurally sound surface, interior or exterior. Use Weld-Cretes open time to your advantage in bonding to concrete shear walls when you need a time lapse between application of bonding agent, placement of reinforcement steel, placement of formwork and placement of concrete. The original chemical concrete bonding agent, Weld-Crete incorporates polyvinyl acetate homopolymer in a patented formulation. For exterior and interior use, Weld-Crete will bond new concrete, Portland cement plaster and cementitious mixes to structurally sound concrete floors, walls, columns, beams, steps and ramps. Weld-Crete can be "painted on" in a single application 1 hour to 10 days prior to concrete placement. Coverages 200 to 300 sq. ft./gallon, approximately, depending upon method of application, temperatures, porosity and texture of the substrate. Weld-Crete is also used for: bonding setting beds for ceramic tile; bonding Portland cement plaster and stucco mixes; and to bond to surfaces such as brick, block, tile, marble, metal, glass block, soundly adhered paint (non-soluble in water, i.e. casien and calcimine paints), and silicone.
node.post_excerpt: For bonding new cement to any clean, structurally sound, exisiting concrete surface.
node.category: Products for Concrete | Bonding Agents | Weld-Crete
node.tags: Weld Bond | Blue Bonding agent | Concrete Bonding | Construction Products | Larsen Products | Concrete Repair | Cement Bonding agent |Concrete bonding adhesive

node.post_content: Plaster-Weld bonds new plaster to any clean, structurally sound, interior surface. The original chemical plaster bonding agent is a patented formulation incorporating polyvinyl acetate homopolymer. DESIGNED FOR INTERIOR USE ONLY, the high performance bonding of one-coat finish plaster and/or two and three coat work to concrete ceilings, walls, columns, beams, and other structurally sound surfaces. Plaster-Weld prepares the surface to allow you to plaster directly to concrete over electric radiant heat cable, and to bond cement mortar beds to smooth concrete for installation of rigid foam insulation. Concrete, brick, block, glass, ceramic tile, wallboard, metals (e.g. sheet lead in x-ray rooms) and marble are suitable sound surfaces, structurally. Plaster-Weld can be used over paints having oil, rubber or vinyl bases, and over silicone-treated surfaces, as well as latex paints.
node.post_excerpt: For bonding new plaster to any clean, structurally sound, interior surface.
node.category: Products for Concrete | Bonding Agents | Plaster-Weld

node.post_content: Acrylic Ad-Mix101 is an organic polymer, a white, milky liquid. It is mixed with varying proportions of water according to the performance required to create a hard, durable surface which is resistant to most chemicals and acids. Acrylic Ad-Mix101 has excellent water and weather resistance, improves curing qualities, and reduces shrinkage cracking.

node.post_content: Larry Light 8 LED Work Light with Magnetic Clip. Let there be Larry; let there be light! The Larry 8 LED Pocket Work Light is a must have tool for all our contractor customers. 8 powerful LEDs provide 60 lumens of bright white light to make sure you do your best work as efficiently and safely as possible. The rotating magnetic clip gives you convenient hands-free lighting by attaching to virtually anything including clipping on your pocket. A reinforced body makes the Larry shock-proof and water-resistant and almost indestructible! The Larry 8 LED Pocket Work Light is perfect for any job! It comes in 6 body colors, Red, Blue, Yellow, Gray, Camo, or Pink (for the Lady in your life), pick your Larry Light color. 3 AAA batteries (included)

node.post_content: BAT LED Light is a multi-mode tactical flashlight and protection device in a sleek, anodized aircraft grade aluminum housing. The high-powered light produces 200 lumens of bright white light, which will cause temporary blindness when viewed directly. The BAT Light has 3 operational light modes: click the power button once for 100% light which produces 200 lumens; click twice for 50% light for 100 lumens; click three times for defensive strobe mode at a stunning 200 lumens. The BAT Light features up to 8 hours of continuous illumination, and has an impact and water-resistant body. Ideal for military, law enforcement, and self-defense.

node.post_content: X-Lens Safety Glasses are stylish professional safety glasses that provide complete wrap-around protection. Frames are constructed of lightweight nylon for durability and comfort. The lenses are a high-grade polycarbonate lens that provides 99.9% UVA and UVB protection. The lenses are anti-static, anti-scratch, anti-fog, and anti-UVA/UVB. A comfortable rubber nosepiece, adjustable temples and foam padding on the brow make these the ultimate in comfort safety wear. These glasses meet ANSI Z87.1 National Safety Standards, and comply with OSHA requirements for industrial eyewear.

node.post_content: DRYLOK® CLEAR Masonry Waterproofer is the first non-pigmented masonry waterproofer specifically formulated for use on bare masonry floor and wall surfaces. This Patent Pending Technology provides a durable, waterproof, easy to clean, non-yellowing high gloss finish. DRYLOK Clear Masonry Waterproofer incorporates ISP CleanGuard®, environmentally safe green biocides, to resist the growth of mildew on the dry paint film. DRYLOK Clear Masonry Waterproofer has been tested in accordance to requirements of ASTM D-7088 Resistance to Hydrostatic Pressure at 4 P.S.I. and ASTM D-6904 Resistance to Wind Driven Rain of 98 mph.

node.post_content: DRYLOK® Latex Bonding Agent bonds concrete and plaster to difficult surfaces such as dense, slick or porous concrete, stone, drywall, hardboard and plaster walls. When used as an additive to concrete mixes for patching, DRYLOK Bonding Agent improves the adhesion and increases the resiliency and elasticity of the patch. DRYLOK Bonding Agent may also be used for pointing of plaster cracks.

node.post_content: DRYLOK® Extreme Masonry Waterproofing Latex Base This smooth waterproof paint is perfect for the most demanding conditions. Ideal for interior, exterior, above or below grade masonry walls, basement walls, retaining walls, foundations, landscape walls, cinder blocks, concrete blocks, bare concrete swimming pools, stucco and brick. Ready mixed  Low-odor Formula. Withstands 15 pounds of hydrostatic pressure, greater than a wall of water 33 feet high. Breathable film  does not trap moisture in masonry. 15-year Warranty. Clean up with soap and water. Applies easily with brush and/or roller. Smooth / Bright White Finish. Passes ASTM D-7088 Resistance to Hydrostatic Pressure and ASTM D-6904 Resistance to Wind Driven Rain.

node.post_content: DRYLOK® Concrete Protector provides clear weatherproof protection against deterioration caused by de-icing salt, gasoline, oil, weathering and efflorescence (white, powdery, salt-like deposits visible on masonry). DRYLOKs unique SaltLok Technology penetrates into the surface providing superior resistance to unsightly efflorescence staining often visible on brick, block and poured concrete surfaces. DRYLOK Concrete Protector seals bare masonry surfaces against dusting staining, surface cracking and pock marking. Soap and water clean-up. Ideal primer prior to applying latex masonry coatings. Coverage = approx 400 sq. ft. per gallon

node.post_content: DRYLOK® E1 is a Hybrid Acrylic Floor Epoxy paint that utilizes advanced epoxy technology for excellent durability. E1 is resistant to hot tire marks and pickup, chemicals, oil, grease and gasoline stains. Cleans up with water and is storable. E1 is a UV-resistant, semi-gloss coating, formulated to protect and beautify residential interior and exterior concrete floors, garage floors, basement floors, walkways, and patios. Coverage = 300 to 400 sq.ft. per gallon.

node.post_content: DRYLOK® E1 Non-Skid Texture Additive increases traction and helps prevent slipping and falling by providing a slip resistant coating. For use with DRYLOK E1 1-Part Epoxy Floor Paint and other oil, latex or epoxy floor paints. DRYLOK E1 Non-Skid Texture Additive will not change the drying characteristics or film thickness recommendation of the paint that it is added to. Coverage = use 2 oz. to 4 oz. per 1 gallon of floor coating.

node.post_content: DRYLOK® Wetlook High Gloss Sealer is a clear, non-yellowing, water-based acrylic coating formulated for use on interior or exterior masonry surfaces. Provides superior hardness and durability. Protects against efflorescence (white, powdery, salt-like deposits) visible on the masonry. Built in flash rust resistance prevents orange staining of surface when applied to masonry containing natural metals. Excellent chemical resistance to de-icing salts, gasoline, oil and weathering. Blush resistant formula will not turn white or haze when exposed to moisture after full cure. Ideal for horizontal and vertical surfaces such as walkways, driveways, pavers, brick, poured concrete, Chattahoochee stone, and artificial stone. Coverage = approx 200 to 400 sq. ft. per gallon.

node.post_content: DRYLOK® Concrete Floor Paint is specially formulated to protect and beautify masonry floors in homes and industry, both indoors and outdoors. DRYLOK Concrete Floor Paint is a scientifically formulated treatment for masonry floors. It outperforms ordinary floor paint under traffic, washings, weather, acids and alkalis. Use on new or previously painted surfaces, Non-flammable, Resists hot tire pick-up, No primer needed, Complies with all current VOC requirements. For use in interior and exterior concrete floors, Concrete steps, garage floors, basement floors, shop floors, walkways, and patios. Coverage = approx 500 sq. ft. per gallon.

node.call_to_action: Call 813.885.4324 to speak with a CMI product specialist today.
node.post_content: DESIGNER DRYLOK is the most advanced decorative finish in masonry waterproof coatings. Backed by a fully-transferrable 10- Year Warranty. Designer DRYLOK features a unique multi-colored specked granite-like finish in their legendary waterproofing formula. Stops 10 psi, greater than a wall of water 22 feet high. Tested in accordance to ASTM D-7088 Resistance to Hydrostatic Pressure and ASTM D-6904 Resistance to Wind Driven Rain of up to 99 mph. This decorative masonry waterproofer with advanced color system imparts a granite like filler system with multicolored specks and has superior hiding capabilities. Guaranteed to stop water, even under pressure, Resists 10 psi, equivalent to a wall of water 22 ft. high. Reduces radon gas penetration. Ideal for interior, exterior, above or below grade masonry walls, basement walls, foundations, retaining walls, landscape walls, poured concrete, foundations, cinder blocks, planters, flower pots, concrete blocks, stucco and brick.Coverage = 60 sq. ft. per gallon. Note: Actual coverage will vary depending upon application method, surface texture and porosity. Not formulated for horizontal surfaces subject to foot traffic.
